about.introduction1: Hello! I'm Megumi, born and brought up in Japan and based in Germany.
about.introduction2: I'm an enthusiastic web developer with an eye for detail and design and I specialize in JavaScript and React and I can easily familiarize myself with any programming language or framework.
about.development1: I started my frontend engineer career at web designing and consulting company in Japan in 2020 then joined the Ironhack Fullstack Web Development Bootcamp in Amsterdam in 2021.
about.development2: My extensive programming experience makes me comfortable to develop and work on both Frontend and Backend build product from scratch.
about.twist1: I've lived multiple countries for studing and working and I enjoyed developing social and communicating. My time abroad has taught me to be a true team player and adaptive with those who have different backgrounds.
about.twist2: Talking about personality, I love traveling,runnning, handicraft, calligraphy and learning German and Korean.
